body:
### [Read this on the main serverless docs site](https://www.serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/examples/cron/)

#Cron Example

Create a scheduled task with AWS Lambda and automate all the things! Examples:

  • JavaScript

For more information on running cron with Serverless check out the Tutorial: Serverless Scheduled Tasks by parallax.

For more information on schedule event check out our docs.
